<cfoutput>
    <!--- Wire Template - Generated by CBWIRE CLI - Docs: https://cbwire.ortusbooks.com/the-essentials/templates --->
    <|outerElementType|>
        <!-- Any valid CFML here -->
        <cfif datePart( 'h', now() ) lt 12 >
            <p>Good Morning!</p>
        <cfelse>
            <p>Good Afternoon!</p>
        </cfif>
    </|outerElementType|><!--- /Wire Outer Element | Wire must be wrapped in a single outer HTML element --->
|wireJSInit|
</cfoutput>
